p: A total of 48 Swiss albino mice (20 ± 1.00 g) were obtained from the Animal laboratory of Sfax, Tunisia. Mice were maintained for a week in a propylene cage at 20 ± 25°C with relative humidity of 55% ± 10% under a cycle of 12 h light/dark. Animals were allowed ad libitum to access to tap water and food pellets.
